posts.post_content:
It's hard to imagine this thing having a detrimental effect on limited at 3BB, or even at 4B. So i guess the high mana cost is just there to make this one a "skill tester".   
  
It'd be worth two stars if it were a Zombie Horse Cat.

posts.post_content:
Leotaus are a native species to Bant, and corpses of which from ages past found in Grixis.
  
   
They're lion/horse hybrids. They're semi-intelligent and make great mounts for the knights of Bant.
  
   
Wish they made good corpses.
